objects.text:
• 4K HDMI Output
• 100W Power Delivery
• 3 USB-A Ports
• Aluminum Design

product_details.name: BENFEI USB C Hub 5-in-1 with 4K HDMI(Certified), 100W Power Delivery, 3 USB-A, Silicone Cable, Aluminum Case Compatible with MacBook Pro/Air, iPad Pro, iMac, iPhone 15 Pro/Pro Max, XPS, Thinkpad
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 7.87 x 7.87 x 7.87 inches. Item Weight: 2.82 ounces. Country of Origin: China.

banner_details:
The banner features a sleek promotional layout for a tech accessory product. It’s divided into four quadrants with contrasting color blocks for a modern, high-tech aesthetic. The top-left section houses the title text (`heading`) in a bold, futuristic font, followed by the subheading (`subheading`) and product tagline (`tagline`) aligned vertically. These text layers use clean, white tones for contrast on dark backgrounds. The product image (`product_image`) is prominently positioned across the top-right, overlapping slightly into the lower half, giving it a 3D floating effect. The bottom-left quadrant includes a bulleted feature list (`description`) and bold pricing (`price`). A prominent call-to-action button (`cta_background` and `cta`) is placed just below the price. angled grid lines, faded tech-style dots, and gradient circles add a modern digital vibe.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Blue: `#2C3E50`
- Slate: `#34495E`
- Light Blue: `#3498DB`
- Deep Blue: `#2980B9`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Light Gray: `#E0E0E0`
- Accent Blue (CTA text): `#3498DB`
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern USB hub with a premium metallic finish. The color palette prominently features a gradient of cool metallic grays, ranging from dark graphite (#2F3742) to steel blue-gray (#6D7A88). The USB port interior highlights a vibrant electric blue (#5DA9DD), adding contrast and emphasizing functionality. The braided cable introduces a subtle black and dark gray weave (#1D1D1F), contributing texture and visual interest. The white logo (#FFFFFF) provides sharp branding contrast against the darker background. These colors are well-blended for a minimalist, professional look, with strategic highlights to guide focus. Ideal banner accents include electric blue and white for clarity.
